title: Rust Primitive Types Exploration
description: In this lab, you will learn about the various primitives provided by Rust, including scalar types such as signed and unsigned integers, floating-point numbers, Unicode scalar values, boolean values, and the unit type. You will also explore compound types like arrays and tuples, and learn how to annotate variables with their respective types or allow Rust to infer the types from context.

meta.title: Explore Rust Primitive Types
meta.description: Learn about Rust's scalar and compound primitive types, including integers, floats, booleans, and more.
meta.keywords: rust playground, integers, rust tutor, rust online compiler, booleans, floats, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
